絑字的基本解释

絑
zhū
古同“朱”，朱红色。
红色缯。

絑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhū］
［《廣韻》章俱切，平虞，章。］
(1)纯赤色。
(2)纯赤缯。

絑字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　絑； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页921第36
【廣韻】章俱切【集韻】鍾輸切，?音朱。【說文】純赤也。引《虞書》丹朱如此。○按《薛季宣·書古文訓》丹朱作丹絑。　又【類篇】一曰赤色繒。　又【集韻】追輸切，音株。義同。

絑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
絑字的起名意思

暂无。

絑
Basic explanation of words
絑
zhū
Ancient with "Zhu", vermilion.
Red ribbon.
絑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhū］
["Guangyun" chapter all cut, Pingyu, chapter. ]
(1) Pure red color.
(2) Pure red silk.
絑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　絑; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 921 36
[Guang Yun] Zhang Juqie [Ji Yun] Zhong Shuqie,? Yin Zhu. [Said the text] Pure red also. Quoting "Yu Shu" Dan Zhu is like this. ○According to "Xue Jixuan·Book Gu Wenxun" Dan Zhu made Dan Yi.　[Classes] One said the red sash.　[Jiyun] Chasing, losing and cutting, sound strain. The same meaning.
